name: Oh! Those Brave Canyon Pilots
description:
Are they mad, brave or a mixture of both? Find out for yourself as you test your spaceship-piloting ability to the max. Choose from a number of highly individual ships  and take on one of three canyon runs, each designed to test your skill at the helm.  Race against others in the online leaderboard rankings...find out if you have what it takes to become the quickest canyon-pilot out there.

This is a VERY early version with no sounds and limited visual effects. Currently, the player can pilot one of a number of ships around 3 distinct canyons and upload their times to the leaderboards. We are using this very early build to gather small chunks of anonymised data to help us to make the game better.

Planned Features: Upgradeable ships - unlockable cards with bonus stats for ships

Real-time racing: Race against friends in real-time, through Steam

Downloadable ghost-times: Race against the quickest pilots in the world by downloading their ghost laps

More: More ships, more tracks, more everything! There will be events and effectors on each track to make racing more dynamic. More effects! Music and sound - currently sorely lacking

Keep up with development and help us out, here: https://discord.gg/FX5U3ejumG
